  • Next

J = VL_IMINTEGRAL(I) calculates the integral image J of the image I. I must a matrix with DOUBLE, SINGLE, UINT32, or INT32 storage class. J is given by 

 J(i,j) = sum(I(1:i,1:j)).

J has the same size as I and the same storage class.

Example

The following identity holds: 

  VL_IMINTEGRAL(ONES(3)) = [ 1 2 3 ;
                             2 4 6 ;
                             3 6 9 ]

See also: VL_HELP().
